demos.name: LMI Control
demos.label: LMI Control Demos
demos.description:
The LMI Control Toolbox is a collection of M- and MEX-files for LMI optimization and LMI-based analysis and design of control systems.

The Toolbox contains functions to analyze the robustness of control systems and design time-invariant or gain-scheduled robust controllers. Lyapunov analysis (quadratic, parameter-dependent, Popov) and mu-analysis are supported. For control design, you can use a combination of LQG, H-infinity, loop shaping, and pole placement constraints.

Using the LMI Lab, you can also specify and solve arbitrary linear matrix inequalities. The LMI Lab features fast LMI solvers for the three generic LMI optimization problems.
